OrgName.entry: KIDS CAN DO FUND FOR POSITIVE ACTIVITIES FUND FOR 8-13 YEAR OLDS

AltName.entry: POSITIVE ACTIVITIES FUND FOR 8-13 YEAR OLDS

Desc.entry: A Sheffield City Council small grants fund for groups working with children aged 8-13 years old in the Sheffield area, which aims to support the city's Youth Stratergy. The fund prioritises activities that involve one or more of the following: arts and crafts, culture and heritage, environmental projects, play, sports or music and creative media. There are different funding rounds in each of the 7 Community Assemblies. Small voluntary and self help groups are eligible to apply.
